sourcesContent:
import useFormValidator from "../../utils/useFormValidator";
import PopupWithForm from "../PopupWithForms/PopupWithForm";

export default function EditProfilePopup({ isOpen, onClose}) {
    const {handleCheck} = useFormValidator();
    return (
        <PopupWithForm name='edit-author' title='Редактировать профиль' textButton='Сохранить' isOpen={isOpen} onClose={onClose}>
          <input
            id="name-author"
            type="text"
            placeholder="Имя автора"
            className="popup__input popup__input_type_name"
            name="nameInput"
            minLength={2}
            maxLength={40}
            required=""
          />
          <span
            id="name-author-error"
            className="popup__error popup__error_field_first"
          />
          <input
            id="about-author"
            type="text"
            placeholder="Об авторе"
            className="popup__input popup__input_type_job"
            name="jobInput"
            minLength={2}
            maxLength={200}
            required=""
          />
          <span
            id="about-author-error"
            className="popup__error popup__error_field_second"
          />
        </PopupWithForm>
    )
}
